Title: Start
Body: On the Home page, click the Start button to begin setting up your match.

Title: Configure Match Settings
Body: On the Settings page you'll be able to set team names and optionally enable overtime (win by 2).
ImageDesc: Match settings form from Settings Screen

Title: Tripod Setup
Body: Set your device on a tripod and align it center with the net with the screen facing towards the court.
ImageDesc: Place camera aligned with center of court along the net

Title: Begin Match
Body: Hit the Begin Match button from the Settings page.

Title: T-Pose on Point
Body: On gaining a point, T-Pose to have NetBuddy watch for which team increased score.

Title: Right Side Scored
Body: If the team on the right scored, raise your right arm to signify point increase.

Title: Left Side Scored
Body: If the team on the left scored, raise your left arm to signify point increase
